update TSTAFF
STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
